program.tc:
Keyword Policy Every affiliate who applies for the Bigpoint partner program accepts the following keyword policy. Disregard for this policy will lead to expulsion from the partner program. The presentation of the brand “Bigpoint”, or any kind of word combination thereof, including an incorrect spelling of Bigpoint, is not allowed. The same applies to all Bigpoint games. The usage of the display URL www.bigpoint.com, as well as those for games offered by Bigpoint, is strictly forbidden. This also includes all forms of the display URL which have been altered or modified. In general customers are not to be given the impression through the advertisement or URL display that he/she will be directed immediately to a website that is run by Bigpoint. A direct forwarding (in particular over an affiliate link) from the search results to Bigpoint or to the games is strictly disallowed. There is a negative list of keywords that may not be bid on. Please book these keywords separately as negative keywords (keywords to be excluded), so that these words won’t be shown automatically by the corresponding search network. Negative keywords can be booked for free at the networks. As an alternative option, all reserved keywords can be booked using the option “exact”. If this is done, the booking of negative keywords is no longer mandatory. Bidding on possible word combinations and different forms of spelling is also not allowed.
Negative list: Bigpoint Actionliga FussballManager XBlaster F1Manager Dark Orbit IceFighter Germanys Next Topmodel Mafia1930 Spaceinvasion Gladiatoren Chaoscars Deine11 Parsec Managergames Hockey Gladiatoren 2 The-Pimps Damoria Managergames Soccer Robofighter Land of Destruction Fragoria Seafight Gladius 2 The Mafia Glorykings Starpet PopstarsTheGame Speedcars Farmerama Battlestar Galactica Online Zoomumba War Of Titans Crimejacks Deepolis Hellblades Maestia Warstory Ponyrama Emporea Gangs of Crime Gangs of Crime 1930 Ruined Online Toon Racer BeBees Drakensang Online
Example of bookings which are not allowed: Bigpoint Big point Big-point Bgpont
If campaigns are being run for competitors who are on the negative list, it is forbidden to show Bigpoint games or to link directly to www.bigpoint.com or any of the Bigpoint games on the landing page of the corresponding search request.

program.name: Destinia - FR - Non Incent
program.description:
Offer Review

Destinia offers the best price for online hotel and flight reservation with NO BOOKING FEES!

 

Affiliate Benefits

Destinia gives attractive commissions to affiliates with two levels of commissions. Affiliates who make more sales earn a higher commission! PREMIUM affiliates will earn 7% on confirmed hotel reservations and 7 € per flight sale!

 

User Flow

A user come to Destinia.com through an Adsmarket affiliate, makes a booking for a flight or hotel and pays with their credit card.

 

Typical Demographics:

Any user with a valid credit card.

 

Sales are validated up to 60 days from the day of the online booking.

 

Offre des commentaires
Destinia offre le meilleur prix pour un hôtel en ligne et de réservation de vols sans frais de réservation!

Avantages affilié
Destinia donne commissions attractif pour les sociétés affiliées à deux niveaux de commissions. Sociétés affiliées qui font plus de ventes gagnez une commission de haut!Sociétés affiliées PREMIUM gagnera 7% sur les réservations d'hôtel confirmées et 7 € par vol vente!

Utilisateur Flow
Un utilisateur de venir à Destinia.com biais d'un affilié Adsmarket, effectue une réservation pour un vol ou un hôtel et paye avec sa carte de crédit.

Données démographiques typiques:
Tout utilisateur d'une carte de crédit valide.

Les ventes sont validées jusqu'à 60 jours à partir du jour de la réservation en ligne.

In order to run this offer with Adwords, please contact your account manager.
Brand keywords and misspellings are restricted in SEM.

MundoMe is operated by a team of highly skilled professionals who know how to convert users and maximize your profits.

All our campaigns are intensively tested, analyzed and fine-tuned in order to get the best converting programs for you. MundoMe is the trendsetter in the field of mobile media & entertainment. You will find here the best converting formats, the highest pay-out rates and offers in more than 20 countries worldwide.

 

Our subscription model allows us to offer the one of the highest payouts in the industry to our affiliate partners.

 

Affiliate Benefits:

You will find here the best converting offers and the highest pay-out rates from Win offers to IQ-tests and the best mobile content. Strong creatives and a killing landingpage. Click the testlink and agree!

 

User Flow:

Affiliates benefit from our simple order process. User needs to enter their mobile phone number and confirm the sales by SMS. Ordering online has never been easier and thus conversion rates are very high.

 

Typical Demographics:

Users between 18 and 55 years old, interested in gadgets, winning products, gaming, music, applications, ringtones, IQ tests and Love tests.
program.restrictions:
FR traffic only

Incentivized/VC/Content locking traffic is allowed

 

•   Use of the word FREE or GRATIS in the ads or website (The affiliates in no way should communicate or in a way imply through their promotions to the end customer that the services/products are FREE.)  Implying by use of similar words that the advertised products are free or at no cost to the customer.

•   Use of brand names in the ads: The usage of Creatives/texts (banners, e-mail, text ads etc) that include brands/logos/trademarks and were not provided by the advertiser, will only be allowed upon the advertiser's approval. Please contact the relevant Matomy representative/account manager if you wish to approve the usage of such creatives.

•   Include our landing pages on pages that actually refer to a different campaign. For example it's strictly prohibited to include a landing page for an iPhone on a page that actually advertises a gift fashion voucher and vice versa.

•   Alternating our landing pages in any form, such as shorten them in a way that the footer text isn't shown in full.

•   Changing the users browser settings in order to load one of our landing pages by default.

 Email traffic from sender "service@sfr.fr" is strictly forbidden, and all future email drops need to be approved by advertiser.


any form of SMS marketing is forbidden on our campaigns in any country of the world. If there is 100% solid proof that the used number database is a valid optin database for sms promotion, you need to ask prior permission from us for the promotion for each country where the sms will be sent to.

program.name: Easyvoyage - FR - Site Under - Non Incent
program.description:
Description générale :
 Comparez les prix de plus de 300 000 offres de voyages chez les plus grandes agences, et trouvez aussi bien votre billet d'avion que votre nuit d'hôtel ou votre location de voiture au meilleur tarif. Lancé en janvier 2001 par Jean-Pierre Nadir, Easyvoyage est le premier portail éditorial consacré au voyage. Easyvoyage présente une approche originale avec une combinaison de cinq dimensions : de forts contenus éditoriaux (équipe de 23 journalistes permanents), comparaison des offres du marché (vols, circuits, séjours, hôtels), notation des hôtels de séjours par des journalistes professionnels (plus de 12 000 hôtels qualifiés), notation des produits par les internautes (forum de discussion…) et sélection des bons plans du web envoyée à nos abonnés. Easyvoyage est leader de l’infomédiation en France. Notre but est de vous informer et vous orienter dans vos choix de voyages grâce à nos moteurs de recherche vous permettant de gagner du temps et de vous présenter les prestations de nos partenaires correspondant le mieux à vos attentes.

 Bénéfice pour les éditeurs :
Easyvoyage est une marque forte sur la France. La transformation de ces moteurs de comparaison de prix est garantie par : - la performance technique des recherches (comparaison de plusieurs millions de vols en temps réel), - une offre quasi-exhaustive avec près de 300 marchands référencés, - un tunnel de conversion très court.

Conversion d'un lead :
Uniquement vols
- moteur de recherche (page d'atterrissage) - page de résultats - clic sur une offre commerciale
Clique sortant

 Cible :
 - IPs françaises, - plus de 25 ans.

Description:
http://www.Easyvoyage.com is the first editorial portal devoted to travel with trade intermediation. Easyvoyage presents an original approach combining four dimensions in one site: high-quality editorial content (a team of nearly 100 people, with 25 journalists who work non-stop seven days a week), comparison of market offers (flights, tours, holidays and hotels), classification of hotels (over 6,000 hotels qualified) and community approach (forum and product grading by the clients).

Offer Benefits:
Easyvoyage receives an average of 100,000 visitors a day, amounting to more than 6 million a month, with 10 million pages viewed. 10% of French Internet surfers use Easyvoyage to prepare their trip (holidays and tours). In 2009, Easyvoyage generated a volume of sales in excess of 450 million euros
User Flow: CPL, click-out flow. User searches Easyvoyage for flights. Then he will get a list of search results. Once the user clicks on one of the search results they got, a new window will appear and redirect them to their result. Pixel will fire on this Pop.
Target:
french Ips +25
Publishers need to start running with a daily cap of $250  


Valid lead: User search easyvoyage interface for flights only on the search box. Then he will get a list of flight search results.Once the user clicks on one of the search results he got, a new window will appear for redirect. Pixel will fire on the Pop.
